name: 簡良翰
objective:
讀書報告、專題討論、機械與自動化科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等，可重覆修習。
Case study, workshop, group discussion, seminars, mechanical engineering and automation in modern Industries.
schedule:
1. Introduction (1 week)
2. Research method, presentation and writing (1 week)
3. Lectures & Seminars by Invited Speakers (10 weeks)
4. Presentations by Selected Students (6 weeks)
scorePolicy:
1. Class Participation (30%)
2. Homework and Seminar Reports (40%)
3. Term Report (30%)
consultation: Office hours: Mon 3-6pm, Wed 3-6 pm.Line group to be announced.
